mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RESERVATION_ID, ROOM_ID, RESERVATION_DATE, RESERVATION_TIME, RESERVER, MEMBER, PURPOSE) VALUES (SEQ_RESERVATION_ID.NEXTVAL,#{room_id}, TO_DATE('2025-01-20', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '10:00-12:00', 1505001, '김인사, 최지원', #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT r2.RESERVATION_ID, r2.ROOM_ID , r.ROOM_NAME, r2.RESERVATION_DATE, r2.RESERVATION_TIME, r2.RESERVER, r2.MEMBER, r2.PURPOSE FROM RESERVATION r2 JOIN ROOMS r ON r2.ROOM_ID = r.ROOM_ID WHERE r2.ROOM_ID = #{room_id}

SELECT e.NAME AS RESERVER, r.MEMBER FROM RESERVATION_PARTICIPANT rp JOIN RESERVATION r ON rp.RESERVATION_ID = r.RESERVATION_ID LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES e ON rp.EMPNO = e.EMPNO WHERE r.RESERVATION_ID = #{reservation_id}
